note.p: Burial: Parish church of San Faustino, Venice

Career: Dissector in Anatomy Theatre, Venice; Public Lecturer in Anatomy, Venice; Prior of the Academy of Surgeons, Venice; refused chairs at Padua and Pisa; corresponded with Marcello Malpighi (FRS 1669) and Robert Boyle (FRS 1663); died of erisipolas of the head, which went to the lungs
Memberships: Accademia Dondonea (one of the founders); Accademia de' Gelati di Bologna; Accademia della Crusca, Florence; Accademia dei Curiosi di Norimberga
